sense.gloss: to defend against, to protect against
to prevent, to avert, to avoid
Japan Defense Agency (became Ministry of Defense in January 2007)
disaster preparedness, prevention of damage resulting from a natural disaster, protection against disaster

sense.gloss: offense and defense, offence and defence
fire prevention, fire fighting, fire proof

sense.gloss: prevention (of plant disease and insect damage), (pest) control, extermination (of harmful insects)
complex inter-relationship (as in the struggle between two types of vine over one piece of land)
Department of Defense (USA), the Pentagon, Ministry of Defence (UK, etc.)
guard, protector, defensive armament, personal armor (armour)

sdata.j: ↑我↑↓わ↓が↑軍↑↓ぐん↓は↑敵↑↓てき↓の↑防御↑↓ぼうぎょ↓を↑突破↑↓とっぱ↓した。
